scripts.clean: concurrently -n clean:server,clean:client,clean:common "npm run --prefix packages/client clean" "npm run --prefix packages/common clean" "npm run --prefix packages/server clean"
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules packages/client/node_modules packages/common/node_modules packages/server/node_modules packages/client/package-lock.json packages/common/package-lock.json packages/server/package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.postinstall: npm i --prefix packages/common && npm i --prefix packages/client && npm i --prefix packages/server
scripts.build:prod: npm run --prefix packages/common build:prod && concurrently -n build:client,build:server "npm run --prefix packages/client build:prod" "npm run --prefix packages/server build:prod"
scripts.build: npm run --prefix packages/common build && concurrently -n build:client,build:server "npm run --prefix packages/client build" "npm run --prefix packages/server build"
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently -n watch:client,watch:common,watch:server "npm run --prefix packages/common watch" "npm run --prefix packages/client watch" "npm run --prefix packages/server watch"
